channel.title: Weapon Swinging poblem!
channel.description: how do i make the godswords in silabs client to swing like a 2h sword and if any one could tell me how do i make a weapon hit twice in a row like a dds spec i know its a timer but how do i add and what is the timer suppose to be set as

item.title: Weapon Swinging poblem!
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:2, topic:145285”]For the swinging thing, you just return a 2h id on the wep anim.

public int GetWepAnim() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // whip { return 1658; }

Then you find something about the holding return and blah blah. I was too lazy to read the rest of your post past ‘if any one could tell’[/quote]

lol the whip emote

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon Swinging poblem!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

For the swinging thing, you just return a 2h id on the wep anim.

public int GetWepAnim() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) // whip { return 1658; }

Then you find something about the holding return and blah blah. I was too lazy to read the rest of your post past ‘if any one could tell’
